name: shopping-queue
description: As a response to current Covid-19 pandemic, we decided to create a web app that helps control the flow of shoppers going to shopping at various store, in response to social distancing policies.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build-run: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
